subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Domenico Pozzovivo of Italy won the 142.3-mile eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia after a strong ride on the tough uphill finish to Lago Laceno, Italy.
snippet: Domenico Pozzovivo of Italy won the 142.3-mile eighth stage of the Giro d’Italia after a strong ride on the tough uphill finish to Lago Laceno, Italy.
